lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: it takes more to create then it does to destroy.
lender.occupational_info: I use math and science to understand the world around us, hoping to improve the human condtion through the application of science and technology to medicine.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: Because my luck in life should not be limited to just me. A lot of people deserve things that they do not have.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to give a little something back, and help those who are really trying to make it in this tuff world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office with mainly Research and design engineers. I run the Inter Company Program that sends our engineers to other R&D Centres around the world

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: We have to empower peopel, but particularly women in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am an advocate and supporter for workers' and women's rights.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I believe people will invest in their future if they see the source of their funds as a loan instead of a donation.
lender.occupational_info: I was a lawyer for many years and retired in 1992 to become a science teacher in a middle school (ages 11 to 13) and retired from that profession in 2006.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I can. I've struggled to get ahead, to make my life better. Someone helped me, and I'm now able to help someone else
lender.occupational_info: I help people that telephone my company for assistance with our website and our products when they are malfunctioning - the products, not the people!

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: It's important to help others be self-sufficient when you can
lender.occupational_info: I design structural elements of buildings to ensure the safety of the occupants

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I like to help
lender.occupational_info: I work on Swimming pools Repairing and Service

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:40

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.occupation: Senior Manager, Donor Database at Operation Smile
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Operation Smile mobilizes a world of generous hearts to heal childrenâ€™s smiles and transform lives across the globe. Our network of volunteers works worldwide to repair childhood facial deformities including cleft lips and cleft palates.

lender.name: jan
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to share with others
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own an agricultural tire business. We employ our son and son-in-law along with two handicap persons.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I think hard working people should get ahead and sometimes need just a little help to have a viable business
lender.occupational_info: I drive a very large truck( 240 Tons)hauling coal in high mountainsof BC

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I believe in women having the opportunity to reach their potential
lender.occupational_info: I educate in the community about how to end domestic violence and sexual assault.

lender.name: Florian
lender.loan_because: I like the accumulation of capital.
lender.occupational_info: very studious.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: Good fortune should be shared.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: Everyone that is out there working hard deserves a good start...

lender.name: Jme & Tim
lender.occupational_info:
Tim teaches people about recycling and works to improve recycling programs.
Jme works to make places healthier for people, particularly poor people. She does research to help people understand how cities and other places can be improved, and works on projects to help improve them.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I want to help, in some small way, those less fortunate, especially women. I admire their determination and courage.

lender.name: Luis
lender.occupational_info: I am the general manager of EDESA, a rural microfinance institution in Costa Rica.

lender.name: Dr. Joanne
lender.loan_because: it is our duty to help others through empowerment not enablement.
lender.occupational_info: I am a researcher at Arizona State University and the CEO of an international nonprofit group, the MISS Foundation.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: "We can't solve problems by using the same kind of thinking we used when we created them." - Albert Einstein

lender.name: Maleny Volleyball Group
lender.loan_because: We put a little money away each week after our weekly volleyball game to support Kiva. We see it as a great way to support those who really need a loan.
lender.occupational_info: We also hope that someone from our group may someday travel to Cambodia to visit some of you.

lender.name: Mark & Ilse
lender.loan_because: As followers of Jesus Christ, it is our passion to bless others w/ no expectations in return. Our loan includes a commitment to pray for the entrepreneurs with whom we partner. We ask that God will bless them in profound ways and reveal His love for them.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: people should not be denied the chance to make a better life for themselves just because of their financial situation.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer, and also coach people in setting up their own business.

lender.name: Tristan
lender.loan_because: I want to reduce the gap between the rich and poor across countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help build devices that let people access the whole world's knowledge from one place.

lender.name: Lita
lender.loan_because: I want to see an impact on the world one family business at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I teach sewing, fashion, and design as well as child development. I teach parenting skills to teenagers.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: Sometimes someone needs a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I assist the Queensland Police with their work.

lender.name: simon
lender.loan_because: I think everybody with a good idea and the will to work should have the possibility to do so. For me some dollars don't hurt. For the people I lend to it's a great opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: I create and promote websites like the documentary-directory that is shown below.

lender.name: Republic of Lavalon
lender.loan_because: The Republic of Lavalon is dedicated to making a difference in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: The Republic of Lavalon is as micronation, a self declared non-territorial nation.

lender.name: Jens-Holger
lender.loan_because: I believe in values like "The strong should support the weak"

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: I can afford easily to lend 25 $ to help people who need it to live better

lender.name: Lia
lender.loan_because: I like to help the world with people who don't have a single business or enough money to make one. So i would like to help!
lender.occupational_info: I do not have a job because i' m 10 years old. I live in Vietnam and my school is named ISHCMC (International School Ho Chi Minh City)

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I cannot work as I am on dialysis for kidney failure but in my country the government supports me very well so I'd like to help others to help themselves and combat the evil of poverty

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because:
Wants to get some good Karma;)
Nice to help people when it really can change a lot of peoples lives, for some money that doesnt really matter too much for myself.
lender.occupational_info: Gambler:P

lender.name: Tania
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born in a country where I do not struggle from day to day. If I can help someone else achieve their goal & their dream then sign me up! I believe we are all here to help each other. Share the humanity & spread the love.
lender.occupational_info: Quite mundane office work tho I also study part time and run a small massage business from home.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I have been assisted myself by various kindnesses through life now i can return by giving back. It feels good & when something good happens to me I lend to another in gratitude.Love being able to help those that large corporates will not.I also get great joy when i see a loan fully funded & anothern individual Or group on their way to production. Good on Kiva
lender.occupational_info: Work in Horticulture prefering plants to humans

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I realize that it takes all of us to make the world a better place and that by helping someone realize their potential, we are all better off.
lender.occupational_info: Through my business, I help businesses and organizations target market to their customers and to thank staff, clients and volunteers.

lender.name: Leigh and John
lender.loan_because: We have been looking for a suitable organisation to enable us to contribute in some small way to developing enterprises. We see Kiva as a means to assist enterprising people achieve their life goals.
lender.occupational_info: Primary school teacher & helping people achieve home ownership

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: I hope it makes the world a better place for someone trying to improve their life.

lender.name: Verena
lender.loan_because: I have lived in Tanzania for 6 months in 2004 and 6 months again in 2008. I have seen how fortunate I am, and how much difference can be made in Tanzania through micro-finance loans.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who come from broken families and sometimes lack positive influences in their lives. I also work with adults who have intellectual disabilities.

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: am a product of opportunity. I was given the chance to rise above, regardless of all the struggles my mother and brother had to go through to help me become a professional. I immigrated to the United States in 1988 from San Salvador, El Salvador. I was 14 years old, and my mother and brother put me through high school. At the age of 18 and after high school I stated working for a construction company building roads. I felt it was almost impossible for me to go to college due to my legal status in the United States; however due to an incident where I herniated my S1 disc in my lower back. I was not able to physically work any longer. My mother and brother gave me the opportunity to enter a community college where I received my associates degree. After graduation, I got married to my wonderful wife, who was also going through the same struggles. She helped me and I became a legal resident and I was able to obtain financial aid and went to graduate from one of the worldâ€™s best engineering schools, Rochester Institute of Technology. After 5 years of hard work and graduating from RIT, I passed my engineering license exam and became a License Professional Engineer in the state of NY. So, this my life story and I hope to assist others overcome their struggles and provide some evidence that with hope and hard work all your goals can be obtained.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Civil Engineer that provides consulting services to small and medium construction project in Long Island, NY.

lender.name: Nikki Gore
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting those who, despite whatever challenges they are facing, are truly committed to being successful.
lender.occupational_info: I help technology companies with their marketing plans and activities.

lender.name: Burke
lender.loan_because: To make the world more self-sufficient
lender.occupational_info: I build information technology

lender.name: Glen, Donna & Samuel
lender.loan_because: Joy in helping
lender.occupational_info: Church work, going to church at Church of Christ, stocks, gardening, genealogy on family, and Bee Keeping.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I have the money to share and like that its being put to good use. I know the importance of sharing the wealth, if no one shared with my parents, my family would not be where it is right now.

lender.name: Travel2help.org
lender.loan_because: We want to give back to Peru, Brazil, India, South Africa, Tanzania & Kenya where our volunteers travel and spend their time in improving the conditions of local communities.
lender.occupational_info: We serve people who want to spend their vacation by volunteering in local projects and charities in developing countries.

lender.name: June
lender.loan_because: How can I not? The old saying may be trite but it is true: You're either part of the solution or you're part of the problem. Inaction is a problem.

lender.name: Chris and Erin
lender.loan_because: We like the idea of being able to help others, and to make a difference with an amount of money that is relatively small (at least, within the US).
lender.occupational_info: Chris makes sure history is preserved when governments and private agencies expand. Erin makes sure people who want to know more about her university have accurate information.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Long ago someone believed in me and loaned me money to finish school. Since then, I have tried to help where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for others and for my country. In retirement, I garden and I bake bread.

lender.name: Glenda
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help enable someone when their circumstances may hinder them from achieving a better way of life and supporting themselves, their families, and their communities. It may be only a small amount, but in Kiva, there is a community behind each entrepreneur, making that seemingly small amount something much larger and more impactful. What a phenomenon this has become! I'm happy to be a part of it all.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: Seems like a fun thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Working on a PhD, my thesis is on figuring out how to clean natural gas.

lender.name: Vijay K
lender.loan_because: I want to
lender.occupational_info: Pharmaceutical number crunching

lender.name: James
lender.occupational_info: I am in school studying the laws of the United States.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I like to help small businesses, especially woman-owned ones.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a government agency that oversees and regulates lawyers in the state of Washington. I write and edit articles for our monthly magazine, write and send news releases to newspapers, and work on our website.

lender.name: Gregory Stromberg
lender.loan_because: I want to be of service and help those in need who want to help themselves. It also makes me feel good when I can return more value than what I receive.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social intrapreneur that runs a charity called cannedwater4kids.org & a toy company that supports this charity called www.toobee.com

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I can help women to work independently, use their potential and grow healthier families. It makes me feel great to know that I am a part of something much bigger than myself and my own family.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a multi-tasker -- mom, language learner and story-teller. Over the past 15 years I've contributed online content for business and not-for-profit orgs. I love new ideas and making a difference through my work in communications.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: what goes around comes around. It's the thing to do. If only everyone would ....
lender.occupational_info: I write novels. I also write nonfiction books that help people do things.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I hope that it will bring some good to a persons life
lender.occupational_info: A small change makes a BIG difference!

lender.name: JONATHAN
lender.loan_because: preciso prestamo para hacer compras de mercaderias en europa para luego venderlas a mi pais en mercadolibre. es un muy buen negocio, es totalmente rentable se saca casi el 100 % de ganancias!!! por favor ayudame!!!
lender.occupational_info:
excellent! I like what I do. I want to overcome even more _____________________________
excelente!! me gusta lo que hago. me quiero superar aun mas

lender.name: Abraham & Julie
lender.loan_because: We want to have a positive impact on someone.
lender.occupational_info: We both find our careers very rewarding.

lender.name: Wool Worth It
lender.loan_because: We believe in reinvesting a % of our profits globally to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Small business in the US selling handmade felt and wool items made from recycled and natural materials.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I want to see people achieve goals and succeed in plans.
lender.occupational_info: I work on an oceanographic research vessel assisting scientists to gather information about the ocean, Earth, and atmosphere.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good!
lender.occupational_info: I provide high quality fitness equipment and advice, for strength, balance and cardiovascular training.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am reminded of how abundant my life is and how blessed I am.
lender.occupational_info: I care for others. I am a nurse. I help people stay well and assist people who are ill to get better.

lender.name: Rossy
lender.loan_because: I need money to continue the school

lender.name: Haley
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in somebody's life, no matter how small. Studying Globalization has opened my eyes and made me see that the world needs help. Before this I had never known that I could help, and now I can help change someone's life with as little as $25.00.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently attending school.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: My daughter Paula, 15, died from cancer. She wanted to donate the money and I will continue with her wishes. Father Zdravko

lender.name: Steffen
lender.loan_because: I want to end poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I write software that enables people to electronically send money around the world.

lender.name: Tim & Steph
lender.loan_because: We are very grateful for what we have, others who work hard should have opportunities

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: All today's discussion about a Financial Crisis makes me angry. I live in Europe/The Netherlands and nobody here is starving from hunger. Almost everybody does not have to worry about the next day survival. 90% Of the worlds population always worry about the next day survival. With my loan I can make it possible that people can have less worries about the next day to come. Instead of a uncertain day I can give them courage to face the next day, week, month, year.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker in a town of 200.000 inhabitant in The Netherlands. I support and help people to improve their neighborhood and to find co-workers in their part of the town who have the same objectives. Projects as social housing improvement as well as traffic-actions. Influencing the local politicians or the social-housing companies to be aware of bad situations. Also the living together of many different cultures in this part of the town can cause problems. With my help these problems are made aware and can be dealth with. Together with other professionals (Police, SocialServant, Medical Care, etc.) I confront the problems in order to solve them together with the people involved. The new yell from Obama "Yes, we can" is a sort of personal yell for me during the past years. And it helps!

lender.name: Walker
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I aim to send out good energy to counter some of the bad I see... it's a vicious cycle, but somebody's gotta do it!

lender.name: Pasha
lender.loan_because: I'm a good girl.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Paying forward the blessings I have received from another is my obligation to honor the gifts received.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the water industry,

lender.name: Helena
lender.loan_because: "Many hands make light work."

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I believe each one of us can be the change we wish to see in the world.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: Because I've traveled in and learned so much in various developing countries and because people have reached out a hand to help me in the past, enabling me to accomplish more than I could have on my own. I am very impressed with Kiva, making it so easy for me to make a loan and follow in these projects.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist, working with metal.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: It helps

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Because I can and should help others in need to better themselves and families. A little jump start is all many need to succeed. On a selfish note, it really feels good!
lender.occupational_info: I work for Anheuser-Busch InBev in Columbus, Ohio. I have worked here for 35+ years making beer. A great job and making beer is still fun today!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I know the joy of being a small business.
lender.occupational_info: Prints, apparel and merchandise featuring my photographs of flowers and felines.

lender.name: Kordula
lender.loan_because: I am sure it will help to empower people and live their vision.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: We're asked to help the poor. I want to give to give them hope and a shot to a better tomorrow.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and other IT stuff. I am systems administrator to a large U.S. metropolitan hotel.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.occupational_info: I help interior designers and architects choose textiles for upholstery (seating), wall coverings, window coverings, and the like.

lender.name: Mary and Luc
lender.loan_because: We want other women in the world to succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people everyday.

lender.name: Macarena
lender.loan_because:
It's a great organization and what you consider a very small amount of money can be extremely useful to someone else and can greatly change their lives.
Anyone that has $25 that they don't necessarily need should definitely lend them to someone in this program, it's absolutely amazing.

lender.name: Ugochi
lender.loan_because: I live to empower.

lender.name: Yan
lender.loan_because: 1. It helps women become self sufficient, gain social capital, and work towards emerging from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Medical Student.

lender.name: ivanpw
lender.loan_because: Every help counts. I've been helped by others - so I'm obliged to help others, too.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in web properties and online businesses.

lender.name: Enyo & Ope
lender.loan_because: I love to help and give to others :-)

lender.name: Dennis A. Espinoza
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurship is one of the most effective means of education and development for any individual, family, community or country.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a former Kiva Fellow and current graduate student at the University of Michigan.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I have worked with many people in similar situations to those seeking loans through KIVA and I know what an enormous difference this type of moral, technical and financial support can make
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Australian government aid agency (currently managing our aid program to the small island countries in the south west Pacific ocean)

lender.name: Jeffery
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it.
lender.occupational_info: I preserve historical records for the legal association of the State Of Texas.

lender.name: Chase
lender.loan_because: I love the feeling of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and I do all of the things that I love to make my living......

lender.name: Margit
lender.loan_because: I'm able to do it and this is a great way to help other people in less fortunate situations ....and it makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I design living and work places for all kinds of different people. Most of them are really nice.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people who are working to improve their lives and can use a "boost".
lender.occupational_info: I manage people who provide technical support to others in the computer industry

lender.name: Murray H.
lender.loan_because: Those most in need do not qualify for any loan by conventional means, yet these people are often the most sincere and hard working, they just need a break to get going. I continue to see first hand how banks refuse money to good hard working honest people while at the same time lose millions on loans they never should have made. Through Kiva we can be the lender and approve the loans ourselves. Take a chance, you may be surprised. The average loss rate is below 1%, so far I have all my loans performing well and many repaid.
lender.occupational_info: I help Canadian people achieve wealth through smart use of quality investment management.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I have the financial means to travel, which brings me riches far beyond just the financial & material. Travelling has afforded me an insight into how much difference small gestures of goodwill can make...

lender.name: Ful
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people to make dreams come true.

lender.name: Christoph
lender.loan_because: I hate the long time fucked-up structures of our world which could be so peaceful, beautiful and great if everybody would just work on it while forgetting the subjective interests for a time. As a single person I cannot change a lot, but I can at least try to.
lender.occupational_info: I manage hardware-based and virtual machines (computers) for large companies in Southern Germany. Currently I administrate about 400 Windows-Servers used to test software builds on.

lender.name: Osamu
lender.loan_because: I hope for the health and happiness of all your family members! Keep your smile!

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with great parents who have provided me with a comfortable life. Now that I am becoming my own person, I would like to give others the opportunity to live comfortably or get on the right path.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time student at The University of Texas at Austin studying accounting and finance. I will graduate in May 2010 with both my Bachelors and Masters degrees in Accounting.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because:
I have so much in my life and I want to share what I have with others.
After all ... we all are one!

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance makes a long-term difference to help people out of poverty. This is a way to involve my children in helping those around the world, too.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: one small positive change for every person adds up to one large positive change for our world.
lender.occupational_info: I meet and greet people who work where I am at and am many times the first face they see that morning.

lender.name: Alec
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I write software for computers.

lender.name: BjÃ¸rn
lender.occupation: I help people and companies with computers.

lender.occupational_info: I'm graphic designer, and I design corparate identity, web sites, logos etc.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Arjan
lender.loan_because: So many results can be achieved by giving away just a small part of your own wealth,
lender.occupational_info: I'm responsible for one of the contact centers of Nuon, the largest energy company in The Netherlands

lender.occupational_info: I study political science

lender.name: Ramesh
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: oej
lender.loan_because: As a person who are working in my own company, I enjoy seeing my money make a difference for fellow entrepreneurs around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I develop free software for telephony on Open Source platforms.

lender.name: Ian & Raven
lender.occupational_info: We raise sheep for wool, train herding dogs and keep chickens for egg production. Raven is also an artist.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I think microfinance could slash poverty worldwide if everyone took part in it. It's an easy way to enable people to make a living for themselves without too much risk.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in high school. Next year I plan on going to college.

lender.name: BABS
lender.loan_because: Banks don't lend to the right people !! This is not about charity, but rather about trying to give everyone the opportunity to achieve their projects...

lender.name: Brent & Courtenay
lender.loan_because: We care about others and every little bit helps!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.occupational_info: I work for an office that supports underrepresented minorities, women and low-income students to pursue studies in engineering. I also paint and illustrate children's books.

lender.name: Massimiliano
lender.loan_because: Mi figlio mi ha convinto

lender.name: luke
lender.loan_because: i have been fortunate in my own life by good luck and hard work, i want to see and help othersÂ work to achieve their goals and ambitions
lender.occupational_info: i am a builder, i build and renovate houses, mainly in the sydney area

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: We could all afford to be just a little kinder to each other.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for Customer Service at a Fortune 200 company

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I started giving to Kiva at Thanksgiving 2008. Helping others to have a chance at prospering makes it easier for me to appreciate all I have to be thankful for.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: My ancestors were entrepreneurs. They worked hard, and with the help of friends and family, they succeeded.
lender.occupational_info: I write and teach history.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I believe that each of us can make a difference. I really learned that lesson from a 6 year old boy called Ryan who raised money for a well in Africa..12 yrs later he's built hundreds of wells in several countries.
lender.occupational_info: I make documentaries and factual tv programs. We try to tell stories that make a difference, inform and inspire and entertain.

lender.name: Ari
lender.loan_because: The Jewish Rabbi Maimonides wrote that that the highest level of charity is to "'strengthen the stranger and the dweller in your midst and live with him,' (Leviticus 25:35) that is to say, strengthen him until he needs no longer fall [upon the mercy of the community] or be in need" (Maimonides, Mishneh Torah, "Laws of Gifts of [that belong to] the Poor," 10:1).
lender.occupational_info: Uri L'Tzedek is an Orthodox social justice organization guided by Torah values and dedicated to combating suffering and oppression. Through community based education, leadership development and action, Uri L'Tzedek creates discourse, inspires leaders, and empowers the Jewish community towards creating a more just world.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get a loan from a bank sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I own a mobile music company

lender.name: jOHN
lender.loan_because: even selfishly, raising others' quality of life around provides us greater prosperity. And, paraphrasing many, "we should judge our civilization by how we treat our world's weakest members."
lender.occupational_info: I protect people from risks resulting from the technology they use.

lender.name: Trista
lender.loan_because: this changes lives.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel better about my job to know that I am sharing the money with people who need help.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people as best I can with phone internet and Tv needs.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: "Is the rich world aware of how four billion of the six billion live? If we were aware, we would want to help out, we'd want to get involved." -Bill Gates

lender.name: Wilfried
lender.loan_because: it may help a little.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to speak for themselves - and act on their own ...

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: i want to do what i can to help others achieve their aspirations.
lender.occupational_info: mind-boggling. ground-breaking. life-altering.

lender.name: Jena
lender.loan_because: I want to help others fulfill their dreams!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want encourage entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses find office space, conference rooms and virtual offices.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I've read about the impact micro-lending has made in people's lives and wanted to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a very large university. I manage all the photocopy centers on campus.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have an opportunity to work at being successful!
lender.occupational_info: I am an arts administrator in the nation's capital bringing the world's greatest performing artists to Washington DC for concerts.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money can go a long way for those trying to better their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: Accounting student at SMU.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: i think that micro-loaning is a great way to help developing countries. The people who get these loans can really make a difference in their community. I think it is smarter and more productive then flat donations.
lender.occupational_info: I work part time at a small bookstore. I work as a cashier and restock the books.

lender.name: Ryann
lender.loan_because: "He has scattered abroad his gifts to the poor; his righteousness endures forever." 2 Cor 9:9

lender.name: Ken, Cathy, Zoey
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have and opportunity to improve his/her life. Microcredit does this.
lender.occupational_info: I empower US citizens to educate their members of Congress on solutions to poverty.

lender.name: Francine
lender.loan_because: The more we help each other the closer we move toward peace in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help train Health Educators

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to support others who have less than myself. I believe in hard work & it touches my heart DEEPLY to read these womens stories.
lender.occupational_info: Home Business > I buy overstock Health & Beauty Items from a local Home Shopping Club OUTLET & re-sell items on EBay. ALSO I have been selling Herbal Supplements for over 12yrs & have many GREAT customers & friends.

lender.name: Kid Lenders
lender.loan_because: We are three very fortunate children who have everything we need/want - food, a home, lots of toys. It is our goal to contribute money to others in the hope that they will become successful and fulfill all of their dreams.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I would love to help other women build their own businesses and provide for their families
lender.occupational_info: I live on a sheep and cropping farm in Australia with my husband and 2 daughters and also run my own web development and graphic design business

lender.name: 30 plus group
lender.loan_because: We are a group of 5 women friends and wanted to help a group of 5 women - sisters across the miles!
lender.occupational_info: When you help a woman, you help the family and village.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: It's fun
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to use a computer program to make Caner Treatments safe

lender.name: ABDUL
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the business of restoring human dignity. I help people take care of themselves.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I once couldn't
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: Small well intentioned gifts make large impacts in the world
lender.occupational_info: I work using alternative medicine to help people feel better

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I love the philosophy of a hand up not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: Owner of a software development company.

lender.name: diane
lender.loan_because: i want to give the little bit that I can and know it's doing some good.
lender.occupational_info: I do a lot of copying documents for meeting and operational manuals

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: Stay at home mum to two beautiful girls, part time Uni student.

lender.name: The John Butler Trio
lender.loan_because: It's a way of supporting the greater community.
lender.occupational_info: Visit the band's website to get a taste for JBT and to learn more about their other initiatives like the JB Seed artists grant, the 'One Small Step' CD which raises funds to 'close the gap' between the life expectancy of Indigenous and non Indigenous Australians - in collaboration with Oxfam.
